s.text: 6. "After news broke that Coca-Cola is contemplating selling its drinks in a temperature-sensitive vending machine , which will be able to raise prices as it gets hotter outside, a Pepsi spokesman said that Coke's plans would 'exploit consumers who live in warm climates.

This is the happy situation in which we find ourselves: the less everyone makes, the better . Well, the better for stockholders, at least."

Of course, Priceline has the curious habit of reporting as revenue the total value of the tickets and hotel rooms that it 'sells' on its site , even though the vast majority of that revenue goes to the airlines and companies supplying the seats and rooms.
